author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Firstar Panel Technology to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on April 27
text:
Zhejiang Firstar Panel Technology Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.20 yuan(before tax)/10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 5 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 26
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 27 and the dividend will be paid on April 27
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/v5GFcE
